ruleContent.content:
<js>
token = source.get('token');
if (token == null || token == '') {
    token = source.getVariable();
}
a=java.hexDecodeToString(result)
if(a.match(/juanming/)){
	result=''
}else {
bid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[0]
cid=java.hexDecodeToString(result).split(",")[1];
t=chapter.tag.match(/\|\s+(.*)/)[1];
if(chapter.isVip()){
	url=`{{h}}content.php?bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid},{"headers":{"tokens": "${token}","chapterTime": "${t}"}}`
	re=java.ajax(url)
	if (JSON.parse(re).code==200){
	c=JSON.parse(re).data
	}else{
		er=JSON.parse(re).error
		java.toast(er)
		c=''
		}
	}else {
   r = String(java.ajax(
        "https://m.qidian.com/chapter/" + bid + "/" + cid + ".html"
    ));
    c = org.jsoup.Jsoup
        .parse(r)
        .select('main#c-' + cid)
        .html();
        c=String(c).replace(/<\/?p>/g,'')
}c
if (java.get("dpkg") == "true" ){
	c=getComments(c, bid, cid)
	}
}
</js>
